mapper.select: SELECT e.EXPERT_NUMBER, e.MEMBER_NUMBER, e.EXPERT_LICENSE_INFO, e.EXPERT_CAREER, e.EXPERT_FIELD_NUMBER, fi.FIELD_NAME, ec.EXPERT_CERT_STATUS_NUMBER, ec.EXPERT_CERT_STATUS_INFO, a.EXPERT_APPLICANT_REASON, a.EXPERT_CHECK_DATE FROM tbl_expert_applicant a LEFT JOIN TBL_EXPERT e ON a.MEMBER_NUMBER = e.MEMBER_NUMBER LEFT JOIN tbl_expert_cert_status ec ON ec.EXPERT_CERT_STATUS_NUMBER = a.EXPERT_STATUS_NUMBER LEFT JOIN tbl_file_expert fe ON fe.MEMBER_NUMBER = a.MEMBER_NUMBER LEFT JOIN tbl_field fi ON fi.FIELD_NUMBER = e.EXPERT_FIELD_NUMBER WHERE a.MEMBER_NUMBER = 100
